MCQ: What was the term used to refer to self-teaching computers in the early days of machine learning?
Choices: a: Artificial Intelligence | b: Neural Networks | c: Machine Learning | d: Self-teaching Computers

MCQ: Which scientist proposed a theoretical neural structure formed by interactions among nerve cells in 1949?
Choices: a: Arthur Samuel | b: Donald Hebb | c: Alan Turing | d: Walter Pitts

MCQ: Which learning algorithm is used for clustering data by grouping similar data points into clusters?
Choices: a: Reinforcement Learning | b: Supervised Learning | c: Unsupervised Learning | d: K-means Clustering

MCQ: What is the term used to describe the process of reducing the number of random variables under consideration by obtaining a set of principal variables?
Choices: a: Dimensionality Reduction | b: Feature Learning | c: Regression Analysis | d: Genetic Algorithms

MCQ: What is the method used to validate machine learning models by splitting the data into training and test sets?
Choices: a: Holdout Method | b: Bootstrap Method | c: K-fold Cross-validation | d: TOC Method
